plugin.name: firepaint
plugin.long: Paint fire particles with a specific or random color onto the screen

option.name: initiate_key
option.long: Key shortcut to initiate fire drawing.

option.name: initiate_button
option.long: Mouse button shortcut to initiate fire drawing.

option.name: clear_key
option.long: Key shortcut to remove all fire particles.

option.name: clear_button
option.long: Mouse button shortcut to remove all fire particles.

option.name: bg_brightness
option.long: The brightness of the background during Firepaint (in percent).

option.name: add_particle
option.long: Adds a fire particle at position (x, y), where x and y are floats.

option.name: fire_size
option.long: The size of the individual particles.

option.name: fire_slowdown
option.long: The slowdown of the fire particles.

option.name: fire_life
option.long: The lifespan of the fire particles.

option.name: fire_color
option.long: The color and opacity of the fire particles.

option.name: fire_mystical
option.long: Have random colors for the fire effect, also known as Mystical Fire.
